transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji sir, good afternoon, good evening.
Customer: Very good evening.
Executive: Roshan Mathur Rao sir, kaise ho aap?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji haanji sir.
Customer: Kaise ho sir aap?
Customer: Badhiya hoon, aap bataiye.
Executive: Bas badhiya sir. Sir actually na waha pe aapke location mein Jio ke network mein hi kuch issue aa raha hai.

Executive: To hum as a team hum find out karne ki koshish kar rahe hain, usko debug karne ki koshish kar rahe hain. Lekin ye sirf aapki problem nahi hai, waha pe aas paas mein aapke aas paas mein jaise Pampara ke aas paas ke kuch kuch cities mein jitne bhi client hai na.
Hmm.
Executive: Sabko ye problem aa rahi hai.

Customer: Aap kya kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan, abhi filhal sir option yahi hai ki abhi aap kuch din tak kuch dusre network jaise koi bhi ho Jio ke alawa koi bhi network se aap chala ke dekhe chalega.

Executive: Ye wali baat hai sir sim. Sim nikalne mein pehle sim nikalne mein 10 din lagte hain, theek hai? Ye high security area hai na.
Customer: Yaha pe yaha pe 10 din lagte hain sim ye agar second sim hoga na to usme usme yaha pe 10 din lagte hain activate hone mein.
Executive: To sir aapka koi dual sim nahi hai matlab koi dusra jaise maan lijiye abhi aap kahin aur pe aap use kar rahe hain ya kahin aur pe hai to wahi hai ki kisi aur ka koi sim hoga to usse ya to aap internet chala sakte hain hotspot leke.
Customer: Are haat baad yaar kya kya matlab samay kya bol aapko pata hai aap kya bol rahe ho main thodi bande ko main apne sath sath chalaunga thodi aise chalega aapko aapko lagta hai koi manega mere sath sath chalna.
Executive: Sir main aapki baat bilkul samajh raha hun lekin problem sir hamare side se hoti to hum dekhiye hum we are trying regularly right.
Executive: Aisa nahi ki aap call kar rahe ho hum log aapko connect karne ki koshish nahi kar rahe hain ya ignore kar rahe hain ya jahan tak jahan tak jahan tak hai hum aapko apni team se bhi internal team jo ki internal team kabhi baat nahi karti kisi se.
Executive: Hum phir bhi aapke liye waha tak koshish kar rahe hain ki internal team se bhi kara de lekin hamare taraf se sir kuch aisa solution hi nahi hai network Jio ki taraf se hi ye kuch issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Haan aisa hai.
Executive: Hamare taraf se hota to cheeze theek ho gayi hoti sir.
Customer: Aisa aisa nahi hai aisa nahi hai ye kisne bola?
Executive: Sir aisa hai sir trust me tabhi to ye problem aa rahi hai na sir nahi to aisa nahi hota main network ka banda khud hun aap ye ye ye kya samjha rahe ho mujhe aap?
Customer: Yaar network main dekho network mein kya hoga yaar chalega yaar kuch nahi chalega yaar chalega hi nahi do mein se ek cheez hoga.
Executive: Sir isi solution mein main agar bolun agar IndiaMART mein problem hoti to ya to chalta ya to koi bhi network aap de do wo nahi chalta jis tarah Jio ka example aapne diya usi tarah sir hamara application ka bhi to example usi tarike ka hai na.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bilkul aapki baat lekin humne aapke samne humne aapke samne koshish kari aapke samne hi humne sab kuch aisa nahi hai ki humne aapke samne nahi kara hua tha.
Customer: Nahi wo wo wo to usse matlab ye jo aap excuse de rahe ho na iske liye.
Executive: Sir dekhiye ab aapne bola to nahi hai sir dekhiye kya hota hai.
Customer: Ye paanch aath din aisa nahi chalega.
Customer: Mere paas theek hai mere mere paas mere paas sim available nahi hoga theek hai matlab koi aur network ka available nahi iska matlab hai main baithunga main apna business band karunga.
Executive: Sir main aapki problem samajh raha hun lekin kahin na kahin sir aisa to nahi hota na ki ek hi source of internet aur ek hi source pe hum pura ka pura dependent hoenge.
Executive: Thoda to sir alternative hum apne taraf se regularly try kar rahe hain na sir aap bhi apne taraf se please thoda sa koshish to kijiye kam to dono ko sath mein milke hi karna hai na.
Customer: Koshish kar kar li na wo time being ke liye na hoti hai koi koshish hoti hai time being ke liye theek hai time being maine maine time being yani paanch din ka maine chalaya theek hai paise kya karke wo chala chala liya ab usse jyada nahi kar sakte hain na kitna karenge.
Executive: Sir hum bhi time being ke liye aapko pata hai aap aap mere se main main mere se din mein kitna lete ho aap aapko ye pata hai wo cheez wo kyun main dunga aapko.
Customer: Main poore do lakh ke de diya hun aapko saal ke.
Executive: Sir dekhiye ye sab discussion mein jayega to hum aap humse kama rahe hain sir tabhi to de rahe hain na sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aisa to nahi hai na sir aap humse IndiaMART se kuch revenue aa raha hoga tabhi to aap IndiaMART ko de rahe hain na to ye sab discussion ka koi fayda nahi hai aap badh ke de do na de do na baat khatam de do na ke liye koshish sir service dene ki hi to koshish hum aapke sath mein kar rahe hain na.
Customer: Are koshish koshish mein saat din nahi lagte koshish mein ek ghanta aadha ghanta lagta hai.
Executive: Technical issue hoga wo wo ek ek ek ghante mein theek hota hai koshish technical fault mein saat din nahi lagenge.
Executive: Sir ab main aapko kya bolun agar rehta to aisa to acha nahi lagta na ki main bhi aapko pareshan karun agar kuch solveable cheeze hoti hamare side se to aapko pareshan karenge.
Customer: Ye to pareshani ki baat hai abhi main disturb nahi hun na ab aapka kuch nahi ja raha hai na aap company ka kya ja raha hai usko usne to paise liye advance uska kya ja raha hai mera business effect ho raha hai na.
Executive: Bataye sir phir abhi jo mere ko alternative samajh mein aaya wo maine aapko bataya aap bataye sir phir kya kar sakte hain.
Customer: Aap aap aapne kya alternative bataya sim lane ko wo to mere paas bhi hai matlab wo wo alternative to main kahin se bhi la sakta hun alternative ye kahan ho gaya.
Executive: To sir alternative aap mujhe sim nikalna aap mujhe sim nikalna hai usme 10 din lagenge activate kyunki ye high security zone hai yaha pe 10 din lagte hain jo second sim hoga usme 10 din lagte hain activate hone mein theek hai.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai koi kisi ko bhi bol sakte hain aap mujhe apna sim de do aisa nahi chalta yaha ye ye aapko pata hai ye high security zone hai.
Executive: Sir main bilkul samajh raha hun lekin koshish to kar sakte hain na sir ki hum chalo utna use nahi kar pa rahe hain lekin aisa to nahi hai ki sab kuch khatam ho gaya hum laptop pe use kar le dusra network laga ke hum use kar le to aisa to nahi hai sir ki bilkul hi band ho gaya hai aapka ekdam kahin pe koi option bacha hi nahi to wo to sir wahi cheez hai na main aapki problem samajh raha hun aapki problem acknowledge aapki problem main samajh raha hun.
Customer: Main bol raha hun kal sham tak to wahi tha na kahin se nahi khul raha tha na.
Executive: To sir hamare ko jaise pata chala hamare ko jaise laga ki ye solveable cheeze hain maine directly aapko Jio se Jio se ye le lo na unse call le lo na kya problem hai unko.
Executive: To wo wahi cheez to hai sir ki internally to hum hum aisa thodi keh rahe hain ki ye permanently Jio mein chalega hi nahi.
Customer: Nahi aap aisa to nahi keh rahe aapko Jio Jio se unko unko bata do hamara business hai aapke sath.
Executive: Internally hum wahi try kar rahe hain sir we are trying to solve it.

Executive: Hum wahi koshish kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Hum wahi koshish kar rahe hain ji hum wahi to hum solution to wahi se la ke denge na aapko.
Executive: To hum wahi koshish kar rahe hain lekin wo thoda time lag sakta hai isliye maine abhi aapko alternative solution usme bhi utna time nahi lagega phir bhi koi nahi aap kar lo main dekhta hun main kya kar sakta hun aap kar lo theek hai jitna aap se ho sake wo kar lo baki to aap aapke jo aap bol rahe hain na ye cheeze sab fail hai aapki.
Executive: Aap solution nahi de pa rahe ho is cheez ka.
Executive: We are trying to solve your concern sir please understand hame aapko pareshan karke aisa kuch hame khushi nahi mil rahi aapke sath mein hum bhi pareshan hai at the end of the day aapko dikkat ho rahi hai sir to aap to hum hi dikkat karoge na.
Customer: Ye kahan samajh rahe ho aapki kam se kam na socho main apna to sochunga na sir.
Customer: Zara mujhe mujhe mujhe wo mail bhej do jo aapne Jio ko bhej diya.
Customer: Kahin pe hai aapke paas record aapne Jio ke sath baat ki hai.
Executive: Sir hamare paas mein wo record nahi hai wo internal team kaise solve kar rahi hai wo internal team ka lookout hai hum is cheez mein lage pade hain ki hum aapki problem solve kara ke de to hum regularly internal team ke sath mein bhi follow up kar rahe hain aur abhi alternative dekhiye kyunki aapko problem ho rahi thi na bar bar isliye abhi alternative solution mein ye cheez hua ki yaar abhi agar Jio walon se nahi ho raha hai to please manage thoda sa client se request karo manage karne ka ki abhi dusre network se wo kar le we are trying to solve this issue on priority aur hum aapko theek hai theek hai theek hai main alternative dekh lunga do din ke liye cheez bata bata kitna time lagega.
Executive: Sir ek bari main time ka aapko confirm karke phir main call karke aapko bata deta hun.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai de de dijiye koi baat nahi.
Executive: Baki please thoda sa manage kijiye sir I'm sorry aapko jo bhi dikkat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji main koi nahi main dekh lunga main kya kar sakta hun.
Executive: Haan haan main try karta hun sir apne side se aur time ka confirmation main aapko deta hun sir whatsapp pe.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai koi issue nahi.
Executive: Theek hai? Okay sir.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing Jio network issues.

- Delay in activating a new SIM card.

- Business is getting affected due to network issues.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the Jio network issue.

- Suggested using an alternative network temporarily.

- Promised to follow up with internal team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm the time and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- network issue, jio, alternative solution, sim activation
